Robert Mattice

  1. Foster Name: Robert R.
  2. Foster Family: Robert Rule
  3. Location of Family: Falls City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-11-15, Cobbleskill, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1939-05-17, Falls City, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Falls City Journal, 27 March 1915; We Are Part of History: The Story of The Orphan Trains by Michael Patrick, Evelyn Sheets and Evelyn Trickel; Orphan Train Riders Cookbook and Other Good Stuff; Falls City Journal, 18 May 1939.
